message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe I can offer you $100 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $100 for the product.

I've already offered you a great deal, Bob! But I'm willing to sweeten the pot. I'll meet you at $105, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $98 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I'll make one last offer. I'll sell the product to you for $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $100 for the product.
